rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious entry area designed to welcome guests while aligning with Vastu principles by facing the east.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area merging with kitchen and dining space for a Mediterranean feel. Natural light from east-facing windows enhances the ambiance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern open kitchen integrated with the living area to promote family interaction while ensuring efficient workflow and adherence to Vastu by having a north-east corner sink location.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent dining space that complements the open living area with ample natural lighting.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Westward-facing room equipped with modern fitness equipment and ample ventilation. Designed to provide privacy and energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A small bathroom for guests ensuring convenience; placed per Vastu guidelines in the north region of the ground floor.

garden.description: Expansive garden space on the west side of the townhouse, featuring Mediterranean landscaping with native flora and water features to promote relaxation.

principles: Entrance aligned with the east for positive energy.
Kitchen sink located in the northeast corner to encourage abundance.
Living area receives ample morning sunlight.
Private gym placed on the west side aligns with natural energy flows while maintaining privacy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony and east-facing windows to invite positive energy in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room situated away from the busy zones. Designed with north-west orientation for a calming ambience.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3 (Shared)
rooms.description: Additional bedroom space ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu by utilizing the south region of the layout.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom facilities located near bedrooms for convenience. Ventilation is enhanced through east-facing windows per Vastu guidelines.

principles: Bedrooms placed in the southern area for restful sleep.
Master bedroom positioned towards the east to harness positive energy.
Balcony in master bedroom designed to face the east to enhance morning sunlight.
